name: Flailing Dice
description:
Made for GMTK 2022 Game Jam, Roll of the Dice

Use your dice to attack enemies, but the dice are always rolling so pick your timing right.

Click the buttons on the side of the dice to attack, dealing damage equal to the dice's current face value

(did not have time to finish some important mechanics, and no html since it's made in Godot 4. There was a last minute error with export so there's a debug button left in by mistake)
